title: firefox stopped working
content: On 11/9/20 my firefox stopped working. when I attempted to access it again, I received a white page stating login stopped because of an unknown entity. Please help. I can still access the web using other browsers.

title: Firefox not updating automatically
content: Hi! Since about two month I have the problem, that firefox does not update automatically anymore. Every time a new version is available I get the message "Firefox can't update to the latest version" and I have to do full download. Searching the forum did not help solving the problem. Is there any way to determine what is preventing firefox from updating? Cheers Christian
creator: chr.kohler

title: Firefox always starts in remote controlled mode
content:
Hi,

I tried to remote control firefox with the Selenium WebDriver and Java fio testing purposes. This ended in some instances of crashed or otherwise leftover running instances of the geckodriver.

I restarted my computer (Win 10) and started Firefox (no remote software started this time).

And now, whenever I start Firefox, it says it is remotely controlled (Robot icon / Orange bar).

How can I start Firefox in un-controlled mode again (so that ie: I can login into google again)?

(Addons = none) Thanks for help.
creator: roccomediatest

title: Firefox loads, then nothing
content: My Firefox issues continue, the App will initiate, but then just sits! No home page loads (Google), but if About is selected it will update! I have followed all the Firefox online troubleshooting advice. I have unloaded the Firefox app via control panel, manually remove remaining folders as instructed, reboot system, and reinstall Firefox. Open Firefox and it just sits won’t even open home page (Tab). Select another page from Bookmarks, same thing won’t load! Try to sign in to Firefox to Sync, nothing happens. Have even used a third party app to remove all traces of Firefox then reboot, reinstall Firefox and the problem continues. I have Firefox working on three other home computers all working perfectly. This inability to run Firefox has been going on now for several weeks. Does the Firefox folks offer a app that removes all traces of a Firefox instantiation like it never was on my computer? Maybe then a fresh install would work again. My other browsers (IE, Chrome, Edge) work fine only Firefox fail to resond. Help! I want my Firefox Browser to work again!!!! Thanks,
creator: jimveyera

content: Hello, Does this web browser meet the standard 15445:2000?

title: advertising when opening a new page
content:
Why does Firefox lend itself for somewhat misleading advestisements that are connected with 'users research', seducing people to start a mobile data subscription and kind of promising the reception of an expensive mobile phone? This after all, if you read very well, means that people pay for a lottery of the device and most probably won't win.

In my opinion the affects mozilla as an independent organisation.

Links below

best regards

Erik Sauër

title: CERTIFICADO DIGITAL FIJO, NO PUEDO SELECCIONAR EL QUE QUIERO
content: Buenos días, cuando voy a realizar alguna operación con Certificado Digital, se me queda seleccionado el último Certificado Digital que he utilizado y no me permite cambiar al Certificado que necesito, he probado saliendo del Mozilla y volviendo a entrar e incluso reiniciando el ordenador y sigo sin poder seleccionar el Certificado Digital que necesito. Tengo marcada la pestaña de:"PREGUNTAR CADA VEZ" en el apartado de certificados de seguridad, aún así no me deja elegir el certificado que quiero de todos los que tengo.Les agradecería me ayuden a resolver esta incidencia. Saludos y Gracias.

title: Unable to surf gmail
content:
Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to mail.google.com. SSL received a record that exceeded the maximum permissible length.

Error code: SSL_ERROR_RX_RECORD_TOO_LONG 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.
creator: shazuan.azamy

title: Firefox browser works intermittantly
content: Hi, I have used Firefox on my desktop pc using Windows o/s many years with minimal problem. Last few weeks Firefox operating strangely. Starts off fine then after opening a few tabs will not open others. Seems to be searching for new url but no show. When I close it down to re-open fresh a pop-up box appears with option 'close firefox'. Only when selected will firefox re-open. That then works fine for a few tabs then will not open after that. I have tried Refresh, Restart without add-ins, Safe mode. None have removed the problem. I have thought about Uninstall then reinstall a 'clean' firefox, but worried about losing all my data. The problem seems to have started a few weeks back after a Windows 10 update but I am not sure about that. Any help gratefully received. Thanks.

And why `Open Contained Folder` has to be greyed out?

title: Help with Downloads Folder and Scroll bar
content:
Hello, somehow I can't open the downloads folder through firefox. When I download a file, image or anything, it shows my downloads folder is empty. I already set the my download folder to C:\Users\USERNAME\Downloads⁩ but when I look at the source of the file after downloading, it leads to C:\WINDOWS\system32\config \systemprofile\Downloads. This also applies when I want to upload a file, I can't access via the quick shortcut below My PC and I have to go to C:\Users\USERNAME\ to access anything from firefox. Is this a bug? and how do I fix this?

Also, somehow my firefox shows my scroll bar like old school style, is there a way to customize this?
